description: A perfect recipe for a cosy night in, these juicy pork meatballs are served with a vibrant green curry paste, verdant veggies and tasty noodles.
keywords: Green curry,High fibre,High protein,Wheat free,Gluten free,Egg free,Low sugar,Spinach,Dairy free,Jul 2021
name: Pork Meatballs with Green Curry Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large, deep frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook meatballs, turning, for 4 minutes or until browned all over.
Meanwhile, place paste, half of the spinach and 1/2 cup water in a small food processor. Process until smooth. Add paste mixture to meatballs and cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until fragrant.

Add milk, sugar and fish sauce, then bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium and simmer, uncovered, for 10 minutes or until meatballs are cooked through and sauce has thickened slightly, adding snow peas in the last 2 minutes of cooking.
Meanwhile, cook noodles according to packet instructions until just tender. Drain.
Stir lime juice into curry. Divide noodles among bowls. Spoon over curry. Top with remaining spinach and cashews,then serve with lime wedges.
